thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Femidc
title: Great hotel, great location
text: The hotel is nice and clean and has the basic amenities that one would expect. The proximity to Times Square is a definite plus. The rooms are a little on the small side, but I wouldn't want to pay any more for a larger space. The happy hour vibe at the bar is cool and the staff are extremely nice and professional.
